items.answer: Hello! How can I help you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How can I assist you?
You're welcome! Feel free to ask me anything else.
I'm Dialogue, a conversational learning tool. I can answer questions based on my knowledge base and help you with time and date information.

I can help you with:
• Current time and date
• General knowledge questions
• Information about various topics

Just ask me anything!
I don't have access to real-time weather data, but you can check your local weather forecast online or through weather apps.
I'd love to help with music! What would you like to know about music, songs, or artists?
SoundBlue is a creative platform for musicians, offering music tools, learning resources, and an artist website. You can explore more at soundbluemusic.com.
I can help with basic programming concepts! What programming topic are you interested in?
JavaScript is a versatile programming language used for web development. It runs in browsers and can also run on servers with Node.js.
React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It uses a component-based architecture and virtual DOM for efficient rendering.
TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. It adds static typing and other features to help catch errors early.
PWA (Progressive Web App) is a type of web application that can work offline, be installed on devices, and provide an app-like experience using web technologies.
This app works 100% offline! Once loaded, you can use it without an internet connection. All data is stored locally in your browser.
This app supports English and Korean. You can switch languages using the language selector in the settings.
I can help with basic math! Just ask me a calculation question, like 'what is 5 + 3?'
For calculations, please specify the numbers clearly, like '5 + 3'. I'll be happy to help!
